title: Replace HEIFIX hero/branding images with more realistic visuals

requirements.text: Add a more realistic (photorealistic) hero image and a more realistic logo image to the app as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.
acceptanceCriteria: New image files exist in frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames specified in imageRequirements.edits output filenames.
The new images visually appear more realistic/photorealistic than the current ones (less illustrative/cartoon-like).

requirements.text: Update the UI to use the new realistic images: replace the Home page hero image src and the header logo image src to point to the new generated asset filenames.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/App.tsx, the header logo uses the new realistic logo filename.
In frontend/src/App.tsx, the Home page hero uses the new realistic hero filename.
The Home page and header render without broken image links in the browser.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not modify the Internet Identity hooks or other files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Do not route images through the backend; serve them as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated.
nonGoals: Implementing or editing the services/products catalog and pricing.

edits: Make the hero image more photorealistic, with realistic lighting and a professional phone-repair workbench scene, keeping room for a left-to-right dark overlay for text contrast (hero-repair.dim_1600x600.png > hero-repair-realistic.dim_1600x600.png)

Make the logo more realistic and professional (still simple and readable at small sizes), avoiding cartoon styling and keeping a transparent/clean background (repair-logo.dim_512x512.png > repair-logo-realistic.dim_512x512.png)
